body.name: FlyDOIT Area Rugs for Bedroom Living Room, 4x6 Black Super Soft Comfy Thickened Memory-Foam Indoor Carpets, Modern Aesthetic Minimalist Carpet for Boys Girls Adults Apartment Nursery Home Décor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 24 mins
features: Upgraded New Material Design: FlyDOIT modern minimalist rug is made of premium short wool coral fleece, which is super soft, luxurious, skin-friendly, no linting and so on. The surface is dense and soft, making you feel like lying on a cloud.
Premium Memory Foam: There is a thickened resilience memory foam sandwich in the middle of our modern indoor carpet to keep your skin off cold floors and also help minimize noise when walking.

Anti-Slip Bottom Design: Our soft carpet has thousands of non-slip granular dots on the back, this upgraded dense non-slip backing allows for a stronger floor fit. This large rug is great for kids and pets who play on the floor.

Perfect Home Decoration: The black carpet adopts a minimalist design and modern style concepts, using solid colors to add warmth and luxury to your room. Cozy rugs are available in a wide range of colors and sizes to meet your different styles and needs, ideal for all modern minimalist decoration, 4x6 feet rugs can be applied to living room rugs, bedroom rugs, kids' rugs, dormitory rugs, nursery rugs, lounge rugs, and other room decorations and more.

Area Rug Notice: Due to easy transportation and dustproof requirements, our furry rugs are vacuum packed and the folds of the black rugs can be automatically recovered within 1-2 days after opening. We recommend you to do a daily cleaned for the throw rug with a vacuum, and you can also wipe the stain with a damp cloth. Our washable rugs support hand or machine cleaning.
body.description: FlyDOIT Latest Luxury Ultra Soft Wool Coral Pile Modern Indoor Area Rug, Perfect for Living Room Bedroom Home Decoration1. This shag rug is made of wool coral fleece, a premium material that makes the plush rug super soft and skin-friendly, very friendly to pets and children's skin.2. The large carpet consists of a 3-layer construction, making the fuzzy rug thick and durable, without worrying about the quality of the floor carpet during use.3. Perfect gift choice, cozy carpets are beautiful and luxurious, great for birthday gifts, mother's day gifts, valentine's day gifts, Christmas gifts and more.Suitable for different scenes and goes well with any interior.Indoor Usage: living room rug, bedroom rug, bedside rug, dormitory rug, classroom rug, kids room rug, nursery rugs, playroom rug, kitchen rug, dining room rug, office rug, lounge rug. And it is also suitable for different holiday decorations, such as Christmas rugs, Easter rugs, Halloween rugs and so on.Some configurations of fluffy carpet:Style: Modern Style, Minimal StyleSpecial Feature: Fluffy, Thickened, No-shedding, Non Slip, DurableColor: navy blue rug, rose red rug, green rug, dark green rug, yellow rug, orange rug, dark grey rug, ivory rug, black rug, grey rug, white rug, pink rug Size: 4x4 feet round area rug, 4x6 feet area rug, 5x8 feet area rug, 6x9 feet area rugWarm tips about our large carpets1. In order to facilitate the transportation and dustproof needs, our living room carpets are vacuum-packed, so creases and become super fluffy need 1-2 days after opening to recover by themselves, please do not worry.2. Daily cleaning is recommended to use vacuum cleaner for care to keep the bedroom carpet comfortable. If you need to wash it, we recommend air drying it to keep it fluffy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: LOVE! I ordered the dark green color, and it is gorgeous! The only thing I wish is that I would have went with the bigger size..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft and full. Already been in the washer twice and still like new. Would buy again and recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very cheap looking
reviews.reviewText: It comes air tight packages. It is assured that rug will fluff up and take shape after a few days. It's been almost a week and this rug looks like it did it off the packaging. The shape is crooked, the seams are crooked and the creases from being folded are still there. It's a great color and size, you just get what you pay for. Does not look like photos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Loved this rug at first! The color, texture and everything matches perfectly for the holidays but if you have a lot of traffic or kids it captures a lot of dirt and it's very hard to vacuum. My lightweight handheld vacuum as well as my robot vacuum was not able to collect the dirt but this could be because of the "fluffy" hairs. Also washed it and hair and dirt (crumbs) were still captured in the hairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After a couple attempts to purchase a rug and returning them, this one is a keeper. The color (red rose) and size is exactly what is described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The color of the area rug as shown is more of a dull yellow. When we opened the package it is definitely a brighter yellow. I love it though! This is the actual yellow that I was looking for and took a chance on purchasing this rug. Super soft as well without being too thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4x4 round rug is perfect
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for what I needed it for! It looks more like blush pink than beige to me, but when I asked my husband he said it was beige so it’s probably just me 🤷🏻‍♀️ lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes folded in a plastic bag
reviews.reviewText: I had to put item in the dryer to release folds and it came out great. It looks beautiful.
